article_node.title: Northern Shield Provides Update on Exploration at Root & Cellar Gold-Silver-Tellurium-Copper Project, Newfoundland
article_node.summary: Northern Shield Resources announced new exploration findings at its Root & Cellar gold‑silver‑tellurium‑copper project in Newfoundland. The company identified a new hydrothermal diatreme breccia system exposed in quarry pits, revealing multiple mineralized zones with gold, copper, and tellurium. Pending drill assay results are expected in a few weeks, and the discovery is seen as a catalyst for further drilling to assess the copper potential and epithermal gold system. The company remains optimistic about the project's upside and plans to advance the diatreme breccia understanding this year.
